casebody.data:
Bruno F. SINIGAGLIO, Petitioner, v. DEPARTMENT OF THE ARMY, Respondent. No. 06-3412. United States Court of Appeals, Federal Circuit. April 9, 2007.

Before LOURIE, SCHALL, and BRYSON, Circuit Judges.

JUDGMENT

PER CURIAM:

This CAUSE having been heard and considered, it is

ORDERED and ADJUDGED:

AFFIRMED. See Fed. Cir. R. 36.
